description: Neocron is an MMO game with cyberpunk atmosphere. In the 28th century there is less life on earth through mass destruction of wars and dirty ecology. You'll have to fight for your own life against huge mutants and robots or other players. Hold outposts for your clan. Start your career and train your character in the city sewers or do missions for your faction. Live your life as you want it. In Neocron you'll never die alone.
author: Neocron Community,  ReaKKtor
